details: This visa allows visitors to travel to the United States for tourism, family visits, or medical treatment. A personal interview at the embassy may be required.
The student visa is issued to individuals enrolled in Canadian educational institutions. Proof of enrollment and financial stability is required.
This visa is for skilled workers who have a job offer in the UK. Applicants must meet specific salary and English language requirements.
The visitor visa is for tourists, family visits, or short business trips. Health insurance is recommended during the visit.
The e-visa is available for tourists and business travelers. It must be applied for online and is valid for entry through specific airports and seaports.
This visa is issued for business-related activities such as meetings, conferences, and negotiations. An invitation letter from a Chinese organization is required.
Tourist visas for Japan are for sightseeing, visiting friends or relatives, or attending cultural events. Supporting documents like travel itinerary and bank statements may be required.
The Schengen visa allows travel across 26 European countries. Applicants must provide proof of accommodation, travel insurance, and sufficient funds.
This visa is for leisure and tourism purposes. Applicants should ensure their passport has at least two blank pages for the visa.
The visit visa is for short-term stays for tourism or family visits. It can be extended for a fee. The application process is often facilitated by sponsors or travel agencies.
This visa allows young travelers to work and travel in New Zealand. Applicants must meet age and health requirements.
A tourist invitation letter from a Russian tour operator is required for this visa. It is valid for a single or double entry.
This visa is for tourists, visiting family, or attending cultural events. Proof of return travel and sufficient funds is required.
The student visa is for those enrolled in South Korean educational institutions. A Certificate of Admission from the institution is required.
This visa allows travelers to visit Thailand for leisure purposes. It can be extended for an additional 30 days at a local immigration office.
This visa is for individuals planning to stay in Mexico for more than 180 days. Proof of financial means or an invitation is required.
Singapore's work visa requires a valid job offer from a local employer. Different types of passes are available based on skill level and job role.
This visa is for short-term visits for tourism, business, or social purposes. It can be extended once for a maximum of 30 additional days.
The Italian Schengen visa allows travel within the Schengen area. Applicants must provide proof of accommodation, travel insurance, and financial means.
The tourist e-visa allows multiple entries for leisure travel. It is part of Saudi Arabia's effort to promote tourism in the country.
